channel.title: Unjail command that i need help with

item.title: Unjail command that i need help with
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Forgive me if this is wrong, I’m somewhat rusty with DeltaScape servers.

[code=php]if (command.startsWith(“unjail”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = ####; //your X coords
                    p.toY = ####; //your Y coords
                    p.action = 0;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been unjailed by " + playerName);
                    sM("You have unjailed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to unjail..");
            }[/code]

If thats wrong, sorry. It would also help if you stated the base you’re using.

Read full topic

item.title: Unjail command that i need help with
item.dc:creator: @bink0100 bink0100
item.description:
@bink0100 wrote:

	else if (command.startsWith("unjail") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 2) { 
        String name = command.substring(7); 
        client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; 
           c.toX = 3087; 
           c.toY = 3491; 
        c.teleblock = false; 
           c.sM("you have been unjailed"); 
        updateRequired = true; 
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

}
